meta-runner.name: UPack Push
meta-runner.description: Run UPack Push to publish a ProGet Universal Feed package.

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.package
param.spec: text description='Path of the .upack file to publish. You may use PowerShell wildcards - this will run through Get-ChildItem to locate all packages to publish.' label='Package' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.target
param.spec: text description='URL of the Universal Feed to which the package(s) should be published.' regexp='https?://.+' label='Target' validationMode='regex' display='normal' validationMessage='UPack feed URL must include the protocol (http/https).'

param.name: teamcity.tool.upack.authentication
param.spec: password description='User name and password to use for servers that require authentication. Example: username:password' label='Authentication' display='normal'
